job_tasks.phrase: Om te zien of er een match is
job_tasks.justification: This phrase relates to assessing how a candidate's profile fits the needs of a business opportunity.

job_tasks.phrase: Om te zien of je voldoet aan de eisen en wensen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates understanding and matching candidate qualifications to business requirements.
This highlights a focus on business success and winning bids, which involves understanding business needs and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Waarom jouw profiel aansluit op de gestelde eisen en wensen
job_tasks.justification: This is about articulating the business value and fit of a candidate's profile for a specific requirement.

soft_skills.phrase: Wij houden van eerlijk en transparant zaken doen
soft_skills.justification: This phrase implies a value placed on clear and honest communication in business dealings.

soft_skills.phrase: Jij hebt zelf natuurlijk het laatste woord in het biedingstarief
soft_skills.justification: This indicates giving the candidate ownership and control over a key aspect of the business proposal.

classification.rationale: The provided job description focuses entirely on the recruitment process, tender procedures, and business-related interactions. It lacks any mention of technical tasks, AI models, software development, or specific technologies typically associated with AI or ML roles.
